wait for movement
face user: target
motion attack: user

face user: forward

show battle hud
opacity not focus: 100%, 60

</target action>

<Follow Action>
Battleback 3 Remove
Battleback 4 Remove
</Follow Action>

description: 恢复一位队友的生命值。
name: 星能灌注
note:
<Row Only: 4>
<Custom Target Eval>
targets.push(target);
if(user.luk>=5){targets.push(user);}
</Custom Target Eval>

<Pre-Damage Eval>
if(user.luk>=6 &&target.mhp<target.hp-value){
target.gainBarrier((-value+target.hp-target.mhp), 0);}
else{
if(user.luk>=3 &&target.mhp<target.hp-value){
target.gainBarrier((-value+target.hp-target.mhp)*0.5, 2);}
}
</Pre-Damage Eval>

hide battle hud

description:

种子数会附带敌人最大生命值的伤害
name: 寄生种子
note:
<After Eval>
    var skillId = 10; // 例如，技能 ID 为 5
    if (user && user.luk >= 3) {
        var action = new Game_Action(user);
        action.setSkill(skillId);

        user.useItem($dataSkills[skillId]);
        user.forceAction(skillId, user);
        BattleManager.forceAction(user);
    }

//BattleManager.queueForceAction(user, 10, user);
</After Eval>

description: 生命值越低造成的伤害越高
name: 负隅顽抗
note:
<Select Conditions>
Any Row
</Select Conditions>
<Row Only: 1, 2, 3>
<Damage Formula>
if(a.luk>=4){value=a.atk* ((a.mhp-a.hp)/a.mhp*5+3) * (1-b.def*0.5/(b.def*0.5+20+b.level*2))}
else if(a.luk>=2){value=a.atk* ((a.mhp-a.hp)/a.mhp*5+3) * (1-b.def*0.75/(b.def*0.75+20+b.level*2))}
else {value=a.atk* ((a.mhp-a.hp)/a.mhp*5+3) * (1-b.def/(b.def+20+b.level*2))}
</Damage Formula>

Any Row

<Custom Target Eval>
minrate=1;
index=0;
for (var i = 0; i < foes.aliveMembers().length; ++i) {
var member = foes.aliveMembers()[i];
if (member.hp/ member.mhp <= minrate) 
 {index=i;
minrate=member.hp/ member.mhp}}
targets.push(foes.aliveMembers()[index])

</Custom Target Eval>


<Damage Formula>
if(a.luk>=4){rate = 4;}
else{rate = 7;}
value=a.mat*(3+rate*(1-b.hp/b.mhp) )*(1-b.mdf/(b.mdf+20+b.level*2))
</Damage Formula>

description:
点燃一位友军 吸收其部分生命值
使其燃烧两回合 攻击其的敌人会受到伤害
name: 焚身
note:
<Row Only: 4>

<Before Eval>
dmg = user.mat*1;
ba = target.barrierPoints();
if(ba>=dmg){
target.loseBarrier(dmg);}
else{
target.loseBarrier(ba);
target.gainHp(ba-dmg);
}

target.startDamagePopup();
user.gainHp(Math.floor(user.mat*1*user._recoverRate));
user.startAnimation(152);
user.startDamagePopup();
target.addState(32)

</Before Eval>

<Custom Target Eval> 
if(user.isEnemy() && user._fenShen!==undefined){
    targets.push(user._fenShen);
}
else{targets.push(target);}

</Custom Target Eval>

description: 立即查看敌人强度
name: 洞察
note:
<Instant Cast>
<Before Eval>
tit=["0","R","SR","SSR","L3","L2","L1"]
if (target.isEnemy()) {
  var id = target._enemyId;
  $gameSystem.addHpGaugeEnemy(id);

  var text = target.name() + '\n';

  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]攻击:\\c[0] ' + target.atk;
  text += '\\px[400]\\c[4]法强:\\c[0] ' + target.mat;
  
  text += '\n';
  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]防御:\\c[0] ' + target.def;
  text += '\\px[400]\\c[4]魔抗:\\c[0] ' + target.mdf;
  
  text += '\n';
  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]进阶:\\c[0] ' + tit[target.luk] ;

$gameMessage.add(text);
 }
</Before Eval>

  for (var i = 0; i < allies.aliveMembers().length; ++i) {

minrow=5;
inde=0;
for (var i = 0; i < allies.deadMembers().length; ++i) {
    var member = allies.deadMembers()[i];
    if (member.row()<minrow ) {
    minrow=member.row();
    inde=i;
}}
targets.push(allies.deadMembers()[inde]);
